---
title: "View your profile"
date: last-modified
---

Access a top-level overview of your account using your profile. At a glance, see your roles, groups, and other details attached to your account.

## Steps

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

2. Go to **{{< fa gear >}} Settings** in the sidebar and select **Profile**.

3. You can find the following on your profile page:

   - Profile details 
   - Roles attached to your account
   - Groups assigned to your account
   - Onboarding and User Interface preferences
   - Values for API Key and Secret Key
